abstract: Zhouqin Burnikel tops off our solving week in a royal way.
snippet: Zhouqin Burnikel tops off our solving week in a royal way.
lead_paragraph: Administrivial Merl Reagle Memorial Alert! If you live in or plan to be in the Tampa, Florida area on Sunday, September 27, Marie Reagle will be hosting a memorial for Merl from 5:00 p.m. to 8:00 p.m. at the University of Tampa in the Vaughn Center (9th floor). The event is open to the public.
